alert.note: Alert for Central and West Carbon; Ferris, Seminoe, Shirley Mountains; Middle North Platte River Basin, Niobrara and Converse High Plains; Niobrara, Lower Elevations of Converse, Thunder Basin National Grassland; North Laramie Range and Adjacent High Plains; North Laramie Valley, Shirley Basin; North Snowy Range Foothills; Sierra Madre Range, Medicine Bow NF; Snowy Range, Medicine Bow NF; Southern Laramie Range; Southern Laramie Valley; Southwest Carbon County; Upper North Platte River Basin (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued October 21 at 6:44PM MDT until October 21 at 7:00PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING FOR PARTS OF SOUTHEAST WYOMING AND THE WESTERN NEBRASKA PANHANDLE SATURDAY... ...RED FLAG WARNING WILL EXPIRE AT 7 PM MDT THIS EVENING FOR STRONG, GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 417, 418, 419, 420, 421, 422, 423, 424, 425, 426, 427, 428, AND 429... Evening humidity has begun to recover this evening and is expected to continue rising through the rest of the evening. Therefore...todays Red Flag Warning will be allowed to expire on time at 7 PM.
